alert.note: Alert for McCreary (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central McCreary County through 115 PM EDT... At 1242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wiborg, or near Whitley City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beulah Heights and Parkers Lake around 1250 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
